description: The Logitech C920 HD Pro Webcam delivers sharp, full HD 1080p video with clear stereo audio. It's great for video conferencing and streaming. With automatic low-light correction, your video quality remains consistent even in dimly lit environments. The built-in dual microphones capture your voice in natural stereo sound.

The Microsoft LifeCam HD-3000 offers 720p HD video for clear calls and video recording. It features a built-in noise-canceling microphone for clear audio. With TrueColor technology, the camera automatically adjusts exposure to deliver bright and colorful video, even in low light conditions.

microphone: Integrated ring light with adjustable brightness
low_light: Adjustable ring light for low-light conditions
description: The Razer Kiyo is designed for streaming and content creation. It provides 1080p video at 30 fps or 720p at 60 fps. The integrated ring light with adjustable brightness ensures you're well-lit in any lighting condition. The camera also features a built-in microphone for clear audio during your streams.
